news.title: Gujarat High Court Introduces AI-Powered Case Scheduling
news.content: The Gujarat High Court has become the first in India to implement an AI-powered case scheduling system. This innovative approach aims to optimize court timings, reduce delays, and improve overall judicial efficiency.

news.title: Industrial Pollution Control Measures Mandated
news.content: The Gujarat High Court has directed the state government to implement comprehensive pollution control measures in industrial areas, with particular focus on air quality monitoring and waste management protocols.

news.title: Gujarat HC Establishes Commercial Court Division
news.content: The Gujarat High Court has established a specialized commercial court division to handle complex business disputes, contract violations, and corporate legal matters with enhanced speed and expertise.
